name: unsegmented
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not having different parts, or not divided into different parts: This is a microscopic animal with an unsegmented body. The segmentation task involved separating unsegmented items (e.g. "deskmotherbat") into their component words. Related word
segment
More examplesFewer examplesThey have an unsegmented body, flexible tentacles, and lateral fins.Molluscs are invertebrates with soft, unsegmented bodies.The abdomen is short and unsegmented. The language sample consists of unsegmented strings of letters or phonemic symbols.This analysis assumes an unsegmented labour market in which workers with similar skill levels have similar life chances.
